title: Complaints
body: I am writing to express my dissatisfaction with the board room ceiling that has been affecting my work recently.
This situation has significantly impacted my productivity and overall morale. Despite my attempts to address the matter personally, I have not seen any improvement or resolution thus far.
I believe it is crucial to address this issue promptly to maintain a healthy and efficient work environment. I kindly request your immediate attention and intervention to rectify the situation.
This situation has significantly impacted my productivity and overall morale. Despite my attempts to address the matter personally, I have not seen any improvement or resolution thus far.

title: Suggestion
body: After some serious brainstorming and a few cups of creativity, I've uncovered a brilliant opportunity to take to the next level. Picture this.

Now, hold on to your hat, because here comes the suggestion that will make our work shine brighter than ever before! It's time to and witness the magical transformation it brings. Get ready to experience streamlined processes, turbocharged collaboration, and a wave of success that will make us the envy of the industry.

resolution: We were able to tackle the situation heads up and make everybody more comfortable in the boardroom, also a new AC have been installed.
